text: @matthewjdowd There is no balance. If more people go to work, more people die, then more people get scared and stop going out. Back to square 1. The solution right now is for government to help people and businesses survive until COVID19 is under control. There is no free-market answer.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: Going Out
entity.description: This entity tracks all conversations about going out.
